caption:
This photograph features a serene outdoor setting by a large body of water, possibly a river or a lake. On the right side of the image, a woman is seated on the edge of a dock or walkway. She has curly hair and wears a colorful sleeveless top paired with jeans. She holds the leash of a large, shaggy dog standing beside her, attentively looking off to the side.

On the left side of the photograph, a man is seated casually with his back against the viewer, looking out toward the water. He is dressed in light-colored slacks, a cream jacket, and dark shoes. A small, black and white dog lies next to him on the ground, appearing relaxed or asleep.

The background features a shimmering expanse of water that fills the upper half of the composition, under a clear sky. The overall vibe of the scene is peaceful and leisurely, with both the humans and animals enjoying a sunny day by the water. The picture captures a moment of tranquility and casual interaction in a picturesque outdoor setting.
title: Morton Street Pier on the Hudson River
